name: Contagion (itch) (Dev-Routine)
description:
-Stop the infection from spreading 

-Cure virus carriers and keep them away from the Hosts

Controls:

WASD: Move

Move Mouse: Look

Space: Jump

E (Hold):  Enter Place Object Mode

Left Mouse Button: Shoot - Place Object

Right Mouse Button: Rotate Object  (While in Place Object Mode)

Mouse Scroll: Change Weapons -  Switch object (While in Place Object Mode)

Controller Support:

Left Stick: Move

Right Stick: Look -  Move Object (While in Place Object Mode)

"x"-  "3": Jump

Right Trigger: Shoot

Left Trigger (Hold): Enter Place Object Mode

up - down: Switch Object (While in Place Object Mode)

Used Assets:

Unity Standard Assets (Animations ONLY)

Models -> Characters and weapons : kenny assets Buildings and environments : Low Poly Fence Pack ,Low Poly Ultimate Home Pack,Lowpoly Modern City Decorations Set Textures : most were taken from a google search so i don't have an accurate attribute Icons[heart, cure,shop]:https://www.flaticon.com/
